title: Excellent Product
review: excellent product in its category.

title: Definitely Noiseless!!
review: It was only after installing Aeroquiet fan in my room I realised that I always turned up the TV volume when my old fan and AC were running simultaneously. It’s been 3-4 days now I have been using Aeroquiet and I didn’t find any need to do that again. It’s practically noiseless. Amazing product.

title: Slightly disappointed
review:
This product is not aero quiet fan, it has air sound and it is audible and the cost of product is very high with this quality.
We can get same quality and sounding fans and good air at 2500 at other companies like polar
I want to buy 6 fans but after checking the quality I stopped for 1 fan

title: Not as expected. Ads are misleading
review:
I am highly disappointed with the product. Fans make noise like other normal fans. I have connected with orient service centre and described the problem. The guy on call refused to acknowledge the problem and accepted that these fans will make usual noise as other normal fans. There is no difference. 
I would suggest don't buy these fans. :( :(

title: Mind-blowing purchase
review: Flipkart service is good, prompt delivery as they committed.
